name: Frog Stealth Game
description:
Made for Mini Jam #55, with the theme of Non-Violent Stealth

• Objective: Jump into the sea at the end of the level, eat all 9 of the flies throughout the level and avoid being eaten by the birds. (You can hide from their vision cones in tall grass)

•Controls:   Space - Jump,  WASD - Move

The web version is less performant due to CPU limitations, feel free to download the executable from below.  Source Code is also available to download :)
